item.description:
Regardless of what you have growing in your garden right now....

Have you ever seen georgeous fruits and vegetables at the farm stand and wondered. "What can I make with that?"

Jennifer Woolf, Acupuncturist & Chinese Herbalist will cover quick and easy recipes which feature local produce but don't require an extra trip to the grocery store on the way home for additional ingredients.

Come with taste buds ready for sampling some tasty treats made from New Hampshire-grown produce!

In addition to indicating "yes" on your RSVP here, it is necessary to call 225-6870 to reserve your seat.
item.how_to_find_us: I personally will not be able to attend this because I'll be away on a trip.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Cooking From the Farmers Market
